channel.title: CVE Feed for NVIDIA -- GPU Display Driver for Linux
channel.description: The latest CVEs for NVIDIA -- GPU Display Driver for Linux

item.title: CVE-2023-25516|2024-10-24T19:52:38.807Z -- nvidia -- gpu%20display%20driver%20for%20linux
item.description: NVIDIA GPU Display Driver for Linux contains a vulnerability in the kernel mode layer, where an unprivileged user can cause an integer overflow, which may lead to information disclosure and denial of service.
